answerChoiceTransparency.description: Indicates in answer choices should have a transparent background. Default value is undefined.
answerChoiceTransparency.title: answerChoiceTransparency

prompt.description: The question prompt or item stem
prompt.title: prompt

spellCheckEnabled.description: Indicates if spellcheck is enabled for the author. Default value is true
spellCheckEnabled.title: spellCheckEnabled

teacherInstructionsEnabled.description: Indicates if Teacher Instructions are enabled
teacherInstructionsEnabled.title: teacherInstructionsEnabled

studentInstructionsEnabled.description: Indicates if Student Instructions are enabled
studentInstructionsEnabled.title: studentInstructionsEnabled

responseContainers.description:
List of the response containers
The response containers are the areas where the images are dragged in

x.description: The x coordinate of the response container
x.title: x

y.description: The y coordinate of the response container
y.title: y

width.description: The width of the response container
width.title: width

height.description: The height of the response container
height.title: height

responseContainers.title: responseContainers

possibleResponses.description: List of img tags that are the possible responses
possibleResponses.title: possibleResponses

value.description:
The value of the response
Each value is an object with a property "images"

images.description: An array containing a string that is a img tag
images.title: images

value.title: value

images.title: images

partialScoring.description: Indicates if the item should use partial scoring
partialScoring.title: partialScoring

maxResponsePerZone.description: Indicates how many responses can be placed in a response container
maxResponsePerZone.title: maxResponsePerZone

duplicateResponses.description: Indicates if duplicate responses are allowed
duplicateResponses.title: duplicateResponses

showDashedBorder.description: Indicates if the response containers should have a dashed border
showDashedBorder.title: showDashedBorder

shuffle.description: Indicates if the possible responses have to be shuffled in the player
shuffle.title: shuffle

language.description:
Indicates the language of the component
Supported options: en, es, en_US, en-US, es_ES, es-ES, es_MX, es-MX
language.title: language

uiStyle.description:
Indicates style options of the component
Supported options: fontsize, possibilityListPosition (top, bottom, left, right)
uiStyle.title: uiStyle

responseAreaFill.description: Indicates the background color of the response area
responseAreaFill.title: responseAreaFill

responseContainerPadding.description: Indicates padding of the response container
responseContainerPadding.title: responseContainerPadding

imageDropTargetPadding.description: Indicates the padding of the image drop target
imageDropTargetPadding.title: imageDropTargetPadding

id.description: Identifier to identify the Pie Element in html markup, Must be unique within a pie item config.
id.title: id

customPlugins.description:
An array of objects that determine custom plugins.
A custom plugin is an object which determines how the button will look like (icon) and the event name that will be triggered when button gets pressed (event).
Example can be found at https://github.com/pie-framework/pie-lib/blob/develop/packages/demo/pages/editable-html.js#L425.

event.description:
The name of the custom event. It needs to be valid (only letters, numbers and "_" can be used).
PIE will emit the event prefixed with "PIE-".
Eg: event = 'client_custom_event_A' => the emitted event will be "PIE-client_custom_event_A"
event.title: event

iconAlt.description: The alt for the custom button icon
iconAlt.title: iconAlt

iconType.description:
The icon type.
Currently, only "SVG" is supported.
iconType.title: iconType

icon.description: The icon string. Currently, only "SVG" is supported, so it needs to be a valid svg.
icon.title: icon

customPlugins.title: customPlugins
